name: Asian Tuna Burger
preparation: Mix first five ingredients until well combined.

Form the mixture into four patties. Patties can be stored in the refrigerator for up to two days. Heat a frying pan to medium, add oil, and pan-fry patties for approximately 5 minutes per side, until crisp and brown on the outside and warmed through.
Serve on buns with your favourite toppings and a dollop of aioli.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix
summary: A creamy roasted garlic condiment for your burger, sandwich or use as a dip for fries or veg.
